hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Bombs (20 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ GS West Inner Room

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Ruto's Letter#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Don't believe in yourself. Believe in the me that believes in you!

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ Larvae Room Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Sun on Floor Room

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #3# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that in the #depths of the well# a spider and a chest hold...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #the Iron Boots#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ GS Basement
Bottom of the Well MQ Lens of Truth Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Water Temple Small Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Zora Tunic#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #2# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Fire Temple Compass#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Left Invisible Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Please don't abandon this seed. Our world deserves saving!

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #Deku Stick Capacity#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Hover Boots# and #the Biggoron Sword#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #a Deku Shield#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.
